'''Crafting Benches''' are used to perform [[Alchemy]] and can be found across [[Teyvat]]. They can also be created inside the [[Serenitea Pot]] as the [[Alchemist's Crafting Bench]].

Crafting Benches are indicated by the [[File:UI Alchemy.png|30px]] symbol on the [[Map]].

==Crafting Methods==
{{Main|Crafting Methods}}
The Crafting Methods available the Crafting Benches include [[Crafting]], [[Converting]], and [[Mystic Offering]].
